short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Metric Unit Converter provides an easy-to-use metric conversion tool via  a widget on your toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Metric Unit Converter offers a wide selection of unit conversion categories, making it easy to convert various types of measurements in one place. Convert Fahrenheit to Celsius, feet to meters, miles to kilometers, and more, using this versatile tool and get instant results.

How to use Metric Unit Converter:
- Click the puzzle icon on your browser toolbar to access the widget
- Select a category for unit conversion (eg. Length)
- Enter a value into an input box (eg. ‘5’ in the mile input box)
- Get precise conversion results across multiple metric units

Want to share feedback? Please fill out this form and help us improve the product for you:
https://metricunitconverter.com/public/contactus_cc.html

You can uninstall this product at any time. Please follow the instructions here: 
https://metricunitconverter.com/public/uninstall_cc.html
